definition: North Korean Central News Agency (KCNA)/abbr. to 朝中社[Chao2 zhong1 she4]
pinyin: Chao2 xian3 Zhong1 yang1 Tong1 xun4 she4

definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: But had not thought that actually has encountered Korean Central News Agency rare refuting .
sentences.chinese: 但沒想到，卻遭到了朝鮮中央通訊社罕見的駁斥。
